keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: A lovely all-in-one meal. Good for entertaining as you can prepare it all ahead.

method.text: Cut each pepper in half vertically down the centre. Leaving the stem intact, remove the core and seeds and discard.
Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and celery and cook for 2 min or until softened.
Add the bulgar wheat and seasoning and cook for 5 min.
Stir in the stock and mushrooms. Cover the pan and cook for 10-15 min, stirring frequently until the liquid is absorbed.
Meanwhile, in a clean pan, dry fry the mince with the thyme for 5-8 min or until well browned.
Combine the mince mixture with the bulgar wheat mixture. Divide between the pepper halves.
Place the peppers in a shallow ovenproof casserole dish. Cover loosely with foil then place in the oven for 25 min or until tender.

title: Bulgar stuffed red peppers
